column1: Smoque BBQ////The first thing we had was the Memphis-Style Baby Rack Ribs which were amazing. Succulent in flavor
column2: great crispy burnt texture on the outside
column3: but soft tender meet you can bite off the bone on the inside. Next
column5: so tender and every little bite had a burst of flavor. The outside was nice and burnt
column6: crispy but the rest of the meat was so soft and juicy. I know I'm making all the Texas Rudy's BBQ fans cry by saying this
column7: but I never liked the brisket there and therefore resigned in thinking I just didn't like BBQ. So in a way...Smoque has changed my (bbq) life.
